title: Misleading Maps: Area Distortion
description: Learn Misleading Maps: Area Distortion in one minute.

hook.text: A US election map shows a sea of red. It looks like 80% voted Republican. The actual vote? 47%.

buildup.text: Choropleth maps color geographic regions by value. But large, empty regions dominate visually.

climax.text: Map projections have always distorted reality. Data maps inherit and amplify those distortions.

punchline.text: Maps show geography well. They show data poorly.

quiz.question: Why can choropleth maps be misleading?
options: Large geographic areas dominate visually regardless of population
